name: International Research Conference on Engineering and Technology 2023
content: IRCET 2023 aims to bring together leading academic scientists, researchers and research scholars to exchange and share their experiences and research results on all aspects of engineering and technology. It also provides a platform for researchers, practitioners, and educators to present and discuss the most recent innovations, trends, and concerns as well as practical challenges encountered and solutions adopted in the fields of engineering and technology. The areas of interest include AI, 5G, IoT, Blockchain, Materials and Applied Science, Nanotechnology, Environmental Engineering, Electrical and Electronic Engineering, Computer Engineering and Technology, Biological and Chemical Engineering, Civil Engineering, and Mechanical Engineering.
